typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as integer,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as double,
		cumulative_count as integer,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> casesdeath
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountryLookup
casesdeath filter(continent=="Europe") ~> FilterEuropeData
FilterEuropeData select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_3_digit = country_code,
		population,
		indicator,
		weekly_count,
		year_week,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Selectrequiredcoulmn
Selectrequiredcoulmn pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		year_week,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['cases', 'deaths']),
	count = sum(weekly_count),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1, CountryLookup lookup(Pivot1@country == CountryLookup@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		country = Pivot1@country,
		country_code_3_digit = Pivot1@country_code_3_digit,
		population = Pivot1@population,
		year_week,
		source,
		cases_count,
		deaths_count,
		country = CountryLookup@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit = CountryLookup@country_code_3_digit,
		population = CountryLookup@population
	)) ~> sink1
